name: Africa Hunting
description:
1 type of planes- transport, they need to be knocked down and for each destroyed plane the player gets +1 to points.
2 type of planes- cargo, they do not need to be knocked down, for each destroyed plane the player gets -5 to points. A cargo plane sometimes drops a humanitarian cargo, for the assembly of which the player gets +1 to points
3 type of planes- combat (military), they need to be brought down, for each destroyed plane the player gets +1 to points. Also this kind can shoot rockets, you need to shy away from them, so as not to die
